name: Promenade: An Afternoon in a Park
name_original: Promenade: An Afternoon in a Park
description:
“On sunny days like these,
it almost doesn’t matter where our steps take us.”

Logo by m.

Scope
  • Visual novel — made in compliance of the rules of the Only One of Any Assets Jam.
    • one thousand words
    • one sprite
    • one background / setting
    • one music track
    • one voice actor
